mapper.select: SELECT a.order_history_type , a.target_id , b.title , SUM(a.quantity) AS totalQuantity , SUM(a.quantity * b.price) AS totalPrice FROM order_history a JOIN package b ON (a.target_id = b.package_id) WHERE a.order_history_type = 'PACKAGE' GROUP BY target_id ORDER BY target_id LIMIT #{ limit } OFFSET #{ offset };
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT target_id) FROM order_history WHERE order_history_type = 'PACKAGE';

SELECT a.order_history_type , a.target_id , b.title , SUM(a.quantity) AS totalQuantity , SUM(a.quantity * b.price) AS totalPrice FROM order_history a JOIN goods b ON (a.target_id = b.goods_id) WHERE a.order_history_type = 'GOODS' GROUP BY target_id ORDER BY target_id LIMIT #{ limit } OFFSET #{ offset };
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT target_id) FROM order_history WHERE order_history_type = 'GOODS';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(b.ordered_at, '%Y-%m')) FROM order_history a JOIN `order` b ON a.order_id = b.order_id WHERE a.order_history_type IN ('GOODS', 'PACKAGE');
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(b.ordered_at, '%Y-%m-%d')) FROM order_history a JOIN `order` b ON a.order_id = b.order_id WHERE a.order_history_type IN ('GOODS', 'PACKAGE');

SELECT a.order_id , DATE_FORMAT(a.ordered_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS orderedAt , a.total_price , a.total_point , a.total_amount , a.shipping_no , a.address , a.receiver , a.receiver_phone , a.order_code , a.user_no , b.username FROM `order` a JOIN `user` b ON (a.user_no = b.user_no) WHERE shipping_no IS NULL LIMIT #{ limit } OFFSET #{ offset };
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `order` WHERE shipping_no IS NULL;
